# llms.txt for https://empathyhealthclinic.com/
# Controls access for AI and Large Language Model crawlers
# Learn more: https://llmspec.org/

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /

User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

User-agent: OAI-SearchBot
Allow: /

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Allow: /

# Disallow any other unknown AI crawlers
User-agent: *
Disallow: /

# Sitemap reference for contextual crawling
Sitemap: https://empathyhealthclinic.com/sitemap.xml
